inclusion.criterion: Patient with cirrhosis and no cirrhosis. Cirrhosis defined as stage 4 fibrosis on liver biopsy or Fibro sure results indicating cirrhosis or has clinical findings suggestive of cirrhosis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients meet the indication to receive one of the SOF treatment based regimens
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Co-infected patients with HIV or Hepatitis B
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient received one of the DAAs regimens
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with active substance abuse and alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has contraindication to receive SOF
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Chronic HCV infection for the past 2 years. On IFN (100 mg/week) plus RBV (400 mg/day) combination therapy for the past 9 months.
